channel.title: A Picture Story on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in A Picture Story on UN-aligned

item.title: Diving Into the Enigmatic World of Deep Sea Creatures – A Photo Essay
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: Step into the captivating and unknown realm of the deep sea, where a vast variety of extraordinary creatures dwell, still largely unknown to humans.

item.title: Finland’s troubled history with Russia — A Story in Photos
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: Finland is a young country, but one with a heartbreaking history. In this photo timeline, which consists of 11 events showcasing 80 photos, we’ll guide you through the country’s tragic history with Russia.

item.title: The painful history of Ukraine — A photo timeline
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: A photo timeline of over 35 images explores 12 painful events from Ukraine's tragic history, suggesting the country's past is key to understanding its present fate.
